title: If Only appoints sixth BDM
text:
If Only appoints sixth BDM 29 July 2015 Save 
If Only has appointed its sixth regional business development manager, writes Abbi Murray . 
Richard Hey will be managing North England, North Wales and the Isle of Man as he joins the luxury specialist. 
He began his career by working for Thomas Cook in 2000 and recently led a sales team for Bedsonline. It is hoped his experience working in the region will help drive sales in the key commercial area. 
Hey will join If Only on the August 3 and is the 10th new recruit to have joined in the last three months. 
Managing director and founder Brendan Maguire said: “We take pride in our day to day contact with agents throughout the UK. 
“Richard, as our business development manager, is a marvellous addition to the team where his key role is to further enhance our profile.”
